main event: An unidentified object was reported to have crashed or landed near Salina, Kansas in June 1960.
interesting points: The object was reported to have dropped out of the sky suddenly, causing a flash and explosion.
No smoke or vapor trails were observed prior to the flash.
The object made a sharp turn and disappeared.
Witnesses in the area confirmed the incident.
The witness claimed similar activity had been occurring in the area for some time and thought it might be a secret project.
